intro: Myosotis ramosissima subsp. uncata, commonly known as the slender forget-me-not, is a flowering plant native to New Zealand. It is characterized by its slender, upright stems and small, delicate blue or violet flowers. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forest floors or along stream banks. Its leaves are lance-shaped and covered in fine hairs, contributing to its distinctive appearance. It is a member of the Boraginaceae family and is valued for its ornamental appeal in gardens.
